scenes.defaultInfo: Click buttons to toggle inputs. Outputs are controlled by the IL program.
scenes.trafficLightInfo: Traffic light sequence: Red (5s) → Green (5s) → Yellow (2s). Load example 11_traffic_light.txt

editor.title: IL Code Editor
editor.placeholder:
Enter IL instructions here...

Example:
LD I0.0
AND I0.1
ST Q0.0

messages.emptyProgram: Please enter instructions for the PLC!
messages.accumulatorEmpty: Accumulator empty! First load the desired variable with LD or LDN!
messages.cannotModifyInputs: Inputs cannot be modified! ST and STN are only valid for outputs!

help.title: Help - PLC Simulator
help.ldn: LDN - Load negated value to accumulator
help.stn: STN - Store negated accumulator to output
help.andn: ANDN - Logical AND with negated value
help.orn: ORN - Logical OR with negated value

about.title: About
about.creditsText: Developed as an academic project for industrial automation study

batch.info: Control the tank using START/STOP. The IL program controls the valves based on level sensors.

compressor.info: 2-compressor system with pressure sensors. Use the selector switch to choose Motor 1 (A), Motor 2 (B), or Blocked (C). Adjust consumption to test automatic switching.

01_hello_world.description: Basic input/output - Press I0.0 to control Q0.0

02_multiple_outputs.description: Control multiple outputs with different inputs

03_and_logic.description: Two-hand safety control using AND logic

04_or_logic.description: Multiple start buttons using OR logic

15_instruction_ld.description: Loads the value into the accumulator

16_instruction_ldn.description: Loads the negated value into the accumulator

17_instruction_st.description: Stores the accumulator value to output

18_instruction_stn.description: Stores the negated accumulator value to output

20_instruction_andn.description: Performs AND operation with negated input

22_instruction_orn.description: Performs OR operation with negated input

23_instruction_ton.description: Output activates after a delay when input is ON

24_instruction_toff.description: Output stays ON for a delay after input turns OFF

25_instruction_ctu.description: Counts up each time input transitions from OFF to ON

26_instruction_ctd.description: Counts down from preset value to 0

07_timer_off_delay.description: Output stays on for 3 seconds after input release

09_counter_up.description: Count up to 5, then activate output

12_batch_automatic.description: Manual tank filling, mixing, and draining with START/STOP buttons

12b_batch_fully_automatic.description: Complete automatic cycle: Fill → Mix (5s) → Drain with single START button

12c_batch_overflow_detection.description: Error handling: detects overflow/spill if filling takes >12s, triggers alarm and emergency drain

13_traffic_light_crossroad.description: Two independent traffic lights for a crossroad intersection

14_traffic_light_safe_crossroad.description: Synchronized traffic lights with collision prevention logic

27_button_switch_basic.description: Simple toggle button: click to turn ON/OFF

28_button_switch_and.description: Two switches in series: both ON to activate output

29_button_switch_or.description: Two switches in parallel: either one activates output

30_button_no_basic.description: Momentary button: active only while held

31_button_no_start_stop.description: Seal-in circuit: START turns ON, STOP turns OFF

33_button_nc_basic.description: Inverted button: TRUE when not pressed

34_button_nc_stop.description: Safe STOP: broken wire = motor stops

35_button_nc_safety.description: Two NC in series for dual protection

27_compressor_basic.description: Simple single compressor with pressure switch and hysteresis control

28_compressor_selector.description: Complete dual compressor system with selector switch (A/B/C positions)

29_compressor_advanced.description: Full demonstration: automatic motor alternation, maintenance counter, timers, and all PLC features
